description.en:
"DigitalNote describes itself as a decentralized Proof-of-Work(bmw512)/Proof-of-Stake(echo512) hybrid blockchain with fast, untraceable transactions and encrypted messaging features. The network is reportedly resistant to 51% attacks via its VRX v3.0 technology and it is mobile-ready with lightweight wallet functionality. A masternode network reportedly enhances untraceability and provides incentive for users to secure the network, whilst enabling fast private transactions and P2P messaging that are difficult to trace or censor. Miners and stakers are encouraged to participate via network fee payouts, facilitating consistent block generation and a fast network.

DigitalNote was originally released as ""duckNote"" by an anonymous individual or group of individuals under the pseudonym ""dNote"" in 2014. Over the years more advancements were added to the protocol, with each major upgrade rebranding the name of the protocol (first ""DarkNote"" and then ultimately ""DigitalNote""). Much like Bitcoin's ""Satoshi Nakamoto"", the original founder(s) vanished in 2017, leaving the open source code to be updated by a community team who have since continued development."

"DigitalNote describes itself as a decentralized Proof-of-Work(bmw512)/Proof-of-Stake(echo512) hybrid blockchain with fast, untraceable transactions and encrypted messaging features. The network is reportedly resistant to 51% attacks via its VRX v3.0 technology and it is mobile-ready with lightweight wallet functionality. A masternode network reportedly enhances untraceability and provides incentive for users to secure the network, whilst enabling fast private transactions and P2P messaging that are difficult to trace or censor. Miners and stakers are encouraged to participate via network fee payouts, facilitating consistent block generation and a fast network.

DigitalNote was originally released as ""duckNote"" by an anonymous individual or group of individuals under the pseudonym ""dNote"" in 2014. Over the years more advancements were added to the protocol, with each major upgrade rebranding the name of the protocol (first ""DarkNote"" and then ultimately ""DigitalNote""). Much like Bitcoin's ""Satoshi Nakamoto"", the original founder(s) vanished in 2017, leaving the open source code to be updated by a community team who have since continued development."

ico_data.description: Digital Note ICCO will be divided into two stages: - Initial Crowdfunding (IC) Stage - Coin Offering (CO) Stage  The IC stage will be performed in the first week where all users can fund a collective XDN-ICCO wallet with XDN. The CO stage will have 3 price steps and a fixed 100,000 XDN lot.

status_updates.description: Not sure if anyone has had a chance to check out the Memeosaur Contest, but if you read between the lines, you will start to see a pattern of the XDN team's desire to build relationships and friends; sharing minds, resources and ideas to build on what we all have. Each of the teams involved in this contest has something to bring to the table. https://www.reddit.com/r/digitalNote/comments/s5ojk0/memeosaur_contest_win_prizes_from_6_different/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=web2x&context=3

UPDATE: The team are working a few plans  and marketing ideas like faucets, education videos, AMA sessions, the hackathon, giveaways, social promotions, Google ADS, more partnerships etc. We see that the community have ideas on doing some marketing and happy to support that with some of the funds. If you have ideas please add them to the Bounty page so everyone has one place to check, comment and it gives everyone the opportunity to vote on the proposals. https://www.digitalnote.org/bounty

- We have successfully stood up the hard fork and confirmed the minting of the coins was successful.
- It has taken some unexpected time to ensure the chain is running smoothly and not being contaminated by the previous fork
- xdn-explorer.com is in the process of reindexing and it should be done within the day
- New version (2.0.0.1) of the Windows and Mac wallets have been publishedon ot Github. github.com/DigitalNoteXDN/DigitalNote-2/releases/tag/v2.0.0.1

UPDATE: Exploit on DigitalNote XDN: We are currently busy with an update to mint about 925M XDN to balance the books at Bittrex as a result of the exploit and subsequent fork that we did. This means that our current circulatory supply will be just on 6B... For more info please check our Telegram and Discord Channels

UPDATE: After further analysis, the attacker had moved 926M XDN coins to Bittrex and dumped them on the market. This was missed by our initial investigation as the funds appeared to stay in a newly created wallet. With Bittrex's help, we we able to identify that this was a newly spawned Bittrex hot wallet. Bittrex confirmed that the exploited funds have been removed from Bittrex. More updates to follow.

Mandatory update to the the new DigitalNote XDN chain:
Please update your wallets and masternodes to the new chain.
https://github.com/DigitalNoteXDN/DigitalNote-2/releases/tag/v1.0.3.9

UPDATE: We have managed to eliminate the 1.8B XDN that was mined illegitimately with the recent Mandatory update introduced. These coins have now been removed from circulation on the new chain. Rest assured we are exploring additional avenues to protect our users' funds and DigitalNote XDN's future. Exchanges have notified us that they are in the process of updating to the new chain. There is no timeline on when each Exchange will do this.
